skins.selfIntroduction: I am the manifestation of the soul of the Sakura Empire, the pride and glory of her warrior spirit. As a Big Seven, I am also the symbol of an era. Open your eyes and bask in my radiance... You may stop basking now, I'm getting a bit sleepy...
skins.acquisition: I am called Nagato, flagship of the Sakura Empire's Combined Fleet. Are you the one known as the Commander? I shall bear witness to whether or not you have the ability to unite this world.
skins.login: Welcome ba... oww, I bit my tongue...
skins.details: Everyone's faces are full of laughter here... I think I am rather fond of this place!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I despise wars, but... at that time, the choice was not mine to make...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Those who speak lightly of war... do you think they are prepared to face the consequences of their actions?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I shall never forget the smiles on the faces of those people who were saved from calamity. That is the reason why I fight.
skins.secretaryTouch: ...! N-No one has ever dared to lay hands on me in such a manner...

skins.shipDescription: It may be presumptuous of me, but please take care of me from now on... Is that acceptable? S-Somehow, it feels a little embarrassing... Ahaha...
skins.acquisition: It may be presumptuous of me, but please take care of me from now on... Is that acceptable? S-Somehow, it feels a little embarrassing... Ahaha...
skins.login: You are the only one who has the nerve to keep me waiting.
skins.details: I am able to smile from the bottom of my heart when I am here. Yes, I am very fond of this place!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I shall fight on! At long last I have discovered, what it is that I fight for!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I shall never forget... the warmth of the hands that pulled me out from the shackles of my armaments...
skins.secretaryIdle3: What will the future hold in store...? For the first time in my life, I want to know the answer.
skins.secretaryTouch: I never knew that being touched like this... could bring me so much joy...

skins.shipDescription: I shall be hosting the commander today. Manjuus, I beseech you to help me look my best. I am... *yawn* a bit sleepy... Urghh... what is that ruckus out there? C-Commander! When did you arrive?
skins.acquisition: I shall be hosting the commander today. Manjuus, I beseech you to help me look my best. I am... *yawn* a bit sleepy... Urghh... what is that ruckus out there? C-Commander! When did you arrive?
skins.login: *yawn* Oh... Commander? I desire a few more minutes of respite... Good night...
skins.details: Commander, what are you going to do on your next day off? I-I would not mind hearing you out.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Good timing. I require your assistance in locating my lost clothes... Just so you know, I did not misplace them because I was playing around, understood?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I sometimes envy Mutsu... Even though I have my freedom now, unlike when I was placed upon a pedestal and worshipped, I can't be carefree like her...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you should come visit me more often if you're not busy. Though Mutsu and Kawakaze keep me company, this place is still too spacious for my tastes.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did you plan to invite me out? ... Very well. Our interests happen to be in concordance.

skins.shipDescription: Perfect, you have arrived. As long as you are here, the usual moon-watching will prove to be much more enjoyable... Why don't you stay here today and rest for a while?
skins.acquisition: Perfect, you have arrived. As long as you are here, the usual moon-watching will prove to be much more enjoyable... Why don't you stay here today and rest for a while?
skins.login: What do you plan to do today? Do call upon me if you need my help.
skins.details: Th-there's no need to be in a hurry to go outside, right...? It's spacious, quiet, and warm here... and you are authorized to pat my fluffy friend.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The moon can be freely enjoyed throughout the year, but there are few opportunities for the two of us to gaze at the moon together...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Mutsu? Let her go out and play. Unlike Kawakaze, she has no awareness of her surroundings... Ah, b-but don't let her hear I said that!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Moon-viewing sake? This has indeed been quite popular, but I... Ah, f-forget it! If you want to drink, then treat yourself! ...after all, I'm not allowed to...
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you wish to comment upon my attire? Hehe, don't underestimate the skill of the Sakura Empire's craftspeople!
